scripts.db-type: node --experimental-import-meta-resolve scripts/db-type.mjs && pnpm eslint src/knex.d.ts src/db-types.ts --fix
scripts.field-type: node --experimental-import-meta-resolve scripts/field-type.mjs && pnpm eslint src/non-regular.ts src/regular.ts src/fields.ts src/fields.extra.ts --fix
